question_text: What does 'no video' symptom indicate during troubleshooting and what are the systematic steps to resolve it?
answer_options: Audio system malfunction affecting multimedia playback capabilities
Monitor displays no signal despite system powering on - check connections, test components systematically
Network streaming issue preventing access to online video content
Software codec problem preventing video file playback in applications
correct_answer: Monitor displays no signal despite system powering on - check connections, test components systematically
explanation: No video means the monitor displays no signal despite system appearing to power on. Resolution steps: 1) Check monitor power and input selection, 2) Verify video cable connections, 3) Test with known good monitor/cable, 4) Reseat graphics card, 5) Try onboard video if available, 6) Check PSU video card power connectors, 7) Test RAM, 8) Clear CMOS if needed.
